snippet: KAUFMAN--Robert. Our hearts are broken. We have lost a prince among men. Rest in peace dear friend. Love, Margie & Steve Fiverson and Nancy & Harold Oelbaum 1/3
lead_paragraph: KAUFMAN--Robert. Our hearts are broken. We have lost a prince among men. Rest in peace dear friend. Love, Margie & Steve Fiverson and Nancy & Harold Oelbaum 1/3
